Sentencas: Glass-ceramics for sealing solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) were developed by sintering and crystallization of the powdered glass seal.
Titulo: Sintering of glasses in the system RO-Al2O3-BaO-SiO2 (R=Ca, Mg, Zn) studied by hot-stage microscopy

Sentencas: The non-isothermal sintering kinetics and crystallization kinetics were studied for four glasses in the system 50SiO(2)(.)(45 - x)BaO(.)xRO(.)5Al(2)O(3) (R = Ca, Mg, Zn and x = 0, 15) (mol%).
Titulo: Sintering of glasses in the system RO-Al2O3-BaO-SiO2 (R=Ca, Mg, Zn) studied by hot-stage microscopy

Sentencas: Hot-stage microscopy (HSM) and differential thermal analysis (DTA) measurements demonstrated that it is possible to first sinter and then crystallize these glasses obtaining glass-ceramic seals with thermal expansion coefficients in the range 9-12 x 10(-6) K-1.
Titulo: Sintering of glasses in the system RO-Al2O3-BaO-SiO2 (R=Ca, Mg, Zn) studied by hot-stage microscopy

Sentencas: The non-isothermal sintering kinetics was analyzed by computer simulations using a previously reported model of sintering for polydispersed glass powders which takes into account the particle size distribution, surface energy and viscosity.
Titulo: Sintering of glasses in the system RO-Al2O3-BaO-SiO2 (R=Ca, Mg, Zn) studied by hot-stage microscopy

Sentencas: Good agreement was found between the measured kinetics with HSM and the calculated kinetics for all glasses.
Titulo: Sintering of glasses in the system RO-Al2O3-BaO-SiO2 (R=Ca, Mg, Zn) studied by hot-stage microscopy
